stats.sde module

stats.sde.sample_ou_process(x0, sigma, tau, dt, N, ntrial=1)[source]
Parameters

  • x0 – initial conditions

  • sigma – standard deviation of driving Wiener process

  • tau – exponential damping time constant

  • dt – time step

  • N – number of samples to draw

Returns

simulated – time-series of sampled values

Return type

np.array
